Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.session

Class ClusterMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.session.ClusterMetrics
  • public class ClusterMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
    OpenTelemetry metrics for the session cluster.

    This class provides metrics for monitoring distributed session replication across cluster nodes.

    Metrics provided:

    • cluster.nodes.active - Number of active nodes in the cluster
    • cluster.sessions.replicated - Sessions replicated to other nodes
    • cluster.sessions.received - Sessions received from other nodes
    • cluster.sessions.passivated - Sessions passivated (removed) via cluster
    • cluster.messages.sent - Total messages sent to cluster
    • cluster.messages.received - Total messages received from cluster
    • cluster.bytes.sent - Total bytes sent to cluster
    • cluster.bytes.received - Total bytes received from cluster
    • cluster.deltas.sent - Delta updates sent (incremental replication)
    • cluster.deltas.received - Delta updates received
    • cluster.fragments.sent - Message fragments sent
    • cluster.fragments.received - Message fragments received
    • cluster.errors.decrypt - Decryption errors
    • cluster.errors.replay - Replay attacks detected
    • cluster.errors.timestamp - Timestamp validation failures
    • cluster.replication.duration - Session replication duration in ms
    Author:
    Chris Burdess
